section.name: Metro Overview
section.p: Metro is component runtime solution. It handles that isues related to application deployment and it handles the issues related to composition and management of components that make up an application. Metro does these things using some strait-forward and simple concepts. First and foremost Metro is an IOC Container (Inversion Of Control) but perhaps more interesting is the support with Metro for the notion of component driven Context Awareness combined with an Active Mangement, Model Driven, Part Based system arctitecture.

p.i: A broader overview of the issues and challenges related to component-based development is presented in the paper Component-based Development Process and Component Lifecycle by Ivica Crnkovic, Stig Larsson, Michel Chaudron.
